query:
SELECT COUNT(*)::BIGINT
            FROM title_group_tags t
            WHERE
                t.deleted_at IS NULL
                AND (
                    t.name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
                    OR EXISTS (
                        SELECT 1
                        FROM unnest(t.synonyms) AS synonym
                        WHERE synonym ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
                    )
                )
